(5 failures in 60s) Closed --> Closed: Successful Request
(Reset failure count) Closed --> Closed: Failed Request
(Increment failure count) Open --> HalfOpen: Timeout Elapsed
(30s wait period) Open --> Open: Request Attempted
(Fail fast, don't call service) HalfOpen --> Closed: Test Request Successful
(Reset circuit) HalfOpen --> Open: Test Request Failed
(Back to open state) HalfOpen --> HalfOpen: Waiting for Test
(Limited requests allowed) note right of Closed CLOSED STATE - All requests flow through - Monitor failure rate - Track response times - Increment error counter end note note right of Open OPEN STATE - Block all requests - Return cached response - Or return error immediately - Wait for timeout period - Log all blocked attempts end note note right of HalfOpen HALF-OPEN STATE - Allow test requests - Limited throughput - Monitor success rate - Quick transition decision end note
